name: Raging Bull
summary: A fighter noted less for his technique than his ability to inflict physical punishment on his opponents, La Motta was once banned from the sport for throwing a fight.

name: The Irishman
summary: The Irishman is an epic saga of organized crime in post-war America told through the eyes of World War II veteran Frank Sheeran.

name: Shutter Island
summary: When a patient at an isolated asylum disappears from a locked room, US Marshall Edward Teddy Daniels investigates but discovers that Shutter Island has a sinister secret.
